tweet: I appreciated hearing from Nemaha County residents at my public meeting yesterday. Nemaha County was greatly affected by the floods and I share their concerns for Congress to pass flood recovery assistance. pic.twitter.com/zwj77YyMUZ

The uninterrupted sale of #E15 gives consumers consistency at the pump & provides year round markets for our farmers. I have long championed the sale of E15 during summer months in Congress, and I am grateful to @POTUS for getting this done.

I joined the Congressional Biofuels Caucus in writing the EPA stressing the importance of finalizing the E15 rule in time for the summer and getting it done right. Consumers must be able to have more choices at the pump this summer.

I am pleased an agreement was reached to remove tariffs on steel & aluminum imports from Canada & Mexico and corresponding retaliatory tariffs. Maintaining these trade relationships is crucial to Nebraska producers, manufacturers, and our rural economy. https://bit.ly/2JN7Ziu
Expanding Japanese market opportunities for Nebraska beef has long been a priority of mine. This is a good step forward. https://bit.ly/2Hx2QZ3

Yesterday, I introduced H.R. 2788, the Rural Health Clinic Modernization Act, along with @RepTerriSewell @cathymcmorris and @daveloebsack . This bipartisan bill provides regulatory relief for RHCs and updates Medicare reimbursements to independent RHCs. https://bit.ly/2w19oKj
